title: Fixed Income Benchmark Data and Trading Indices Technology Launches
text: As the bond market becomes more challenging with lower yields in Treasury notes and inverted yield curves, the need for more data to make investment decisions is imperative. As a result, BondWave LLC, a leading financial technology firm focused on fixed income solutions, announced the launch of its Benchmark Data and Trading Indices (BDTI).

title: Upcoming Fed Meeting Could Boost Bitcoin
text: The Federal Reserve meets later this week with many market observers expecting another rate cut of 25 basis points. That move would likely provide a short-term assist to an array of asset classes, including bitcoin.

title: Oil plummets 6% as Saudi output seen returning soon after attacks
text: Oil prices dropped more than 6% on Tuesday after a top Saudi Arabian source told Reuters that production could be fully back on line within weeks, quicker than initially thought following weekend attacks that halved the kingdom's output.

title: Saudi oil output to recover in two or three weeks after attack: sources
text: Saudi Arabia sought to calm markets on Tuesday after an attack on its oil facilities, with sources in the kingdom saying output was recovering much more quickly than initially forecast and could be fully back in two or three weeks.

title: Oil down as Saudi output rebound seen soon; stocks weak as Fed meets
text: Oil prices dropped sharply on Tuesday after a Reuters report said Saudi Arabia's crude production could be fully back on line within weeks, quicker than initially thought following weekend attacks that halved the kingdom's output.

title: Wall Street falls as energy drags; focus shifts to Fed meeting
text: U.S. stocks edged lower on Tuesday as a drop in oil prices weighed on the energy sector, while investors stayed away from making big bets ahead of the Federal Reserve's two-day policy meeting, where it is widely expected to cut interest rates.

title: Fed rate cut is coming, but corporate insiders still doubt it's really necessary
text: A Federal Reserve rate cut at the end of this week's two-day FOMC meeting is considered a "lock" by the market, but chief financial officers of major corporations still harbor doubts about whether lowering interest rates is necessary.

title: Saudis yet to brief OPEC colleagues, IEA on oil outage: sources
text: Saudi Arabia has yet to brief fellow OPEC members and other energy sector players about how long it will take to restore the country's oil output, OPEC and industry sources said as Riyadh tries to assess damage from the weekend's crippling attacks.

title: Macron worried attack on Saudi oil may hurt moves to ease U.S.-Iran crisis: diplomats
text: An attack on Saudi oil installations that halted half the kingdom's output could harm French diplomacy meant to avert feared U.S.-Iranian conflict, diplomats said after President Emmanuel Macron's top envoy held talks in Saudi Arabia.

title: Trump's Fed pick, Shelton, calls for Fed coordination with White House
